titles.title: Stop WOKE at State Act
Stop Wasteful, Odious, and Kooky Exercises at State Act
Stop WOKE at State Act

A bill to ensure that Foreign Service officers are evaluated and given opportunities for advancement based on their conformance to merit system principles, to require the review of Performance Improvement Plans during tenure and promotion appraisals of Foreign Service officers, and to eliminate the requirement for the inclusion of a public member on selection boards.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
